content:
ExtendedDN Enum

In this Article

The ExtendedDN enumeration specifies the format in which to return the extended distinguished name. This enumeration is used with the stem.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.ExtendedDN* property.

Syntax

Declaration

public enum ExtendedDN

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ValueType
  • System.Enum
  • ExtendedDN

Remarks

The extended form of a distinguished name includes a string representation of the objectGUID property of an object. For security principal objects such as users, groups, and computers, the extended form also includes a string representation of the objectSID property. For more information about the objectGUID and objectSID properties, see the topics Object-Guid and Object-Sid in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

Fields

HexString

Indicates that the distinguished name uses the hexadecimal format.
None

Indicates that the distinguished name uses the distinguished name format.
Standard

Indicates that the distinguished name uses the standard string format.
